text: Cimitarra Airport is an airport serving the town of Cimitarra in the Santander Department of Colombia. The airport is northwest of the town. The Barrancabermeja VOR-DME (Ident: EJA) is located north-northeast of the airport. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Cimitarra *OurAirports - Cimitarra *SkyVector - Cimitarra *FallingRain - Cimitarra Airport * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Cimitarra Airport
